credit_cards.name: Chase Freedom Flex
credit_cards.description: A no-annual-fee card offering rotating 5% cashback categories, plus elevated rewards on travel, dining, and drugstores.
benefits: Intro APR offer on purchases and balance transfers
Cell phone protection when you pay your bill with the card
Access to Mastercard World Elite benefits

credit_cards.name: Chase Slate Edge
credit_cards.description: A credit-building card with no annual fee, focusing on low interest rates and credit line increases.
benefits: Automatic review for higher credit line with on-time payments
0% intro APR on purchases and balance transfers
Annual APR reduction consideration when you pay on time

credit_cards.name: Chase Sapphire Preferred
credit_cards.description: A travel rewards card offering elevated points on travel and dining, with flexible redemption options.
benefits: 25% more value when redeeming through Chase Travel

credit_cards.name: Chase Freedom Unlimited
credit_cards.description: A straightforward cashback card with elevated rewards on travel, dining, and drugstores, plus unlimited 1.5% on all other purchases.
benefits: Intro 0% APR for 15 months on purchases and balance transfers

credit_cards.name: Chase Sapphire Reserve
credit_cards.description: A premium travel card offering high rewards on travel and dining, with luxury perks and benefits.
benefits: Global Entry or TSA PreCheck fee credit

credit_cards.name: Chase Freedom Rise
credit_cards.description: A card designed to help build credit, offering cashback on everyday purchases with no annual fee.
benefits: Automatic credit limit increase review after 6 months
